deinit.desc: de-initialize device (put shared computational devices to powersave mode after experiments)

detect.desc: detect various properties (features) of a given platform

exchange.desc: exchange various information with a public server (for crowd-benchmarking/crow-tuning)

get_from_wmic.desc: get information from WMIC tool on Windows

show.desc: show entries in user-friendly html format

init_device.desc: init remote device (useful when preparing shared computational device)
